title: Michiel Coignet
summary: Michiel Coignet (also Quignet, Cognet or Connette in Italian) (1549 in Antwerp â€“ 24 December 1623 in Antwerp) was a Flemish polymath who made significant contributions to various disciplines including cosmography, mathematics, navigation and cartography. He also built new and improved scientific instruments and made military engineering designs.
